channel.title: Fedora on Sandors Systems Scribbles
channel.description: Recent content in Fedora on Sandors Systems Scribbles

item.title: Add WebProxy Cert to Fedora
item.description: The Goal Make Fedora work behind a restrictive idiotic corporate web proxy Install a corporate cert to make that happen Get the cert Install the cert spudBud@pineApplez> openssl x509 -text -in /path/to/proxycert.crt >> /etc/pki/tls/certs/ca-bundle.crt The result Your corporate overlord has now man in the middled your personal gmail, have fun.
